abilities.name: Charge.
abilities.description: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

abilities.name: Relentless
abilities.description: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.
abilities.recharge: (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).
